int main ()
{
    //freopen("addictive.in","r",stdin);
    //freopen("addictive.out","w",stdout);
    
    string s;
    cin >> s;
    s += '+';
    char c = s[0];
    int F, curF;
    F = curF = 1;
    
    for (int i=1 ; i<sz(s) ; i++)
    {
        if (s[i] != s[i-1])
        {
            if (curF > F)
            {
                F = curF;
                c = s[i-1];
            }
            else if (curF == F)
            {
                c = min(c,s[i-1]);
            }
            
            curF=0;
        }
        
        curF++;
    }
    
    cout << c << endl << F << endl;
}
